snippet.title: Neon Snap: The Tetromino Puzzle Challenge
snippet.description:
Neon Snap is now available for Android, iPhone, and PC!
-- Download links below --

Solve pixel art inspired puzzles by fitting together tetrominos! Neon Snap features easy to learn mechanics, mind bending gameplay, over 100 puzzles, and many levels designed by PixelatedCrown!

Download links:

PC: http://j.mp/NeonSnap

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/neon-snap/id668897062

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BipolarDesign.NeonSnap

Amazon Appstore: http://www.amazon.com/BipolarDesign-Neon-Snap/dp/B00DC8UNA4

Samsung Apps: http://www.samsungapps.com/appquery/appDetail.as?appId=com.BipolarDesign.NeonSnapSam


More by BipolarDesign: http://j.mp/BipolarDesign

Music by Chris Zabriskie: http://chriszabriskie.com/

Level Design by Pixelated Cowboy: http://pixelatedcowboy.tumblr.com/
